#{listItem}

select ss.title,s.sku,ss.shop_parent_sku shopParentSku,ss.status,ss.fnsku,(SELECT MAX(img.`img_url`) FROM `sku`,`img` WHERE img.`entity_id`=ss.sku_id AND img.`img_type`='sku.sku_img') imgUrl,s.colour_number colourNumber from shop_sku ss left join sku s on ss.sku_id=s.sku_id
and ss.shop_sku=#{shopSku} and ss.fnsku=#{fnsku}

select ss.shop_sku_id shopSkuId,ss.shop_sku shopSku,ss.shop_parent_sku shopParentSku,p.product_name productName,p.product_code productCode, s.shop_name shopName from shop_sku ss left join sku on ss.sku_id=sku.sku_id left join product p on sku.product_id=p.product_id left join shop s on ss.shop_id=s.shop_id
and ss.shop_id=#{shopId} and p.product_code like concat('%',#{productCode},'%')
and ss.shop_sku like concat('%',#{shopSku},'%') and sku.sku like concat('%',#{sku},'%') and p.product_name like concat('%',#{productName},'%')
and ss.shop_parent_sku like concat('%',#{shopParentSku},'%')
and ss.shop_id in(select shop_id from shop_user where user_id=#{userId})
group by ss.shop_parent_sku
order by p.product_code,sku.sku
select sum(inventory_quantity) from shop_sku ss WHERE ss.sku_id=#{skuId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_sku(shop_sku,sku_id,shop_id,create_by) SELECT CONCAT( #{shopId},s.`sku`) shop_sku,s.sku_id,#{shopId} shop_id,#{createBy} FROM sku s WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM shop_sku ss WHERE ss.`shop_sku`= CONCAT( #{shopId},s.`sku`) )
INSERT INTO shop_sku(shop_sku,sku_id,shop_id,create_by) SELECT CONCAT( s.`shop_id`,#{sku}) shop_sku,#{skuId} sku_id,s.`shop_id`,#{createBy} from shop s where s.type=2
mapper.select: SELECT ss.shop_sku_id shopSkuId,ss.head_trip_cost headTripCost,s.weight FROM shop_sku ss,sku s WHERE ss.shop_id=#{shopId} and ss.sku_id=s.sku_id AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM `shop_head_trip_cost` shtc,`shop_sku_head_trip_cost_his` sshtch WHERE shtc.`month`=#{month} AND sshtch.`shop_head_trip_cost_id`=shtc.`id` AND sshtch.`shop_sku_id`=ss.`shop_sku_id`) order by ss.shop_sku_id LIMIT 1000
SELECT count(0) FROM shop_sku ss,sku s WHERE ss.shop_id=#{shopId} and ss.sku_id=s.sku_id and (s.weight is null or s.weight>=1000)
SELECT ss.* FROM shop_sku ss,sku s WHERE ss.shop_id=#{shopId} and ss.sku_id=s.sku_id and s.sku=#{sku}
